entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 30 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
